tasks.task: Harvest bok choy from a tower garden.
subtasks: Reach into the tower garden to retrieve the bok choy.
Grasp the bok choy, ensuring to handle it gently to preserve the roots.
Pull the bok choy out from the tower garden, separating it from the roots if necessary.
Place the harvested bok choy into a container or onto a surface.

tasks.task: Prepare a stir fry using the harvested bok choy.
subtasks: Gather necessary ingredients for the stir fry, including the harvested bok choy.
Clean the bok choy under running water to remove any dirt or debris.
Slice the bok choy into appropriate sizes for the stir fry.
Heat cooking oil in a wok or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add other ingredients to the stir fry, following a recipe or personal preferences.
Add the sliced bok choy to the stir fry and cook until tender-crisp.
Taste the stir fry and adjust seasoning if necessary.
